    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_109112</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Measurement of acceleration due to gravity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messen der Beschleunigung wegen der Schwerkraft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mesure de l'accélération due à la pesanteur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Medida do acceleration  devido à gravidade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Misura di accelerazione dovuto gravità</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέτρηση της ταχύτητας λόγω στη βαρύτητα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Medida de la aceleración  debido a la gravedad</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second of three illustrations showing experimental set-ups for measuring the acceleration due to gravity. This set-up uses a ticker timer to monitor the movement of a weight.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Acceleration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">experiments</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Measurement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ticker tape</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ticker-timer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weight</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von drei Abbildungen, die 
experimentelle Installationen für das Messen der Beschleunigung wegen
der Schwerkraft zeigen. Diese Installation benutzt einen 
Börsentelegraphtimer, um die Bewegung eines Gewichts zu überwachen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu de trois illustrations montrant 
des installations expérimentales pour mesurer l'accélération due à
la pesanteur. Cette installation emploie un temporisateur de 
ticker pour surveiller le mouvement d'un poids.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de três ilustrações que mostram 
instalações experimentais para medir o acceleration  devido à 
gravidade. Esta instalação usa um temporizador do ticker 
monitorar o movimento de um peso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di tre illustrazioni che mostrano
le messe a punto sperimentali per la misurazione dell'accelerazione 
dovuto gravità. Questa messa a punto usa un temporizzatore del 
ticker per controllare il movimento di un peso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη τριών απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν 
πειραματικές οργανώσεις για τη μέτρηση της ταχύτητας λόγω στη 
βαρύτητα. Αυτή η οργάνωση χρησιμοποιεί ένα χρονόμετρο 
τηλετύπων για να ελέγξει τη μετακίνηση ενός βάρους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de tres ilustraciones que 
muestran las disposiciones experimentales para medir la aceleración  
debido a la gravedad. Esta disposición utiliza un temporizador 
del ticker para vigilar el movimiento de un peso.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
